QuestData.Title: Guise of the Deceiver
QuestData.Description: In a cave not far from here, there lives an old woman named Challe.$b$bI knew Challe many years ago when I was young; though as I have become old and grey, she has kept her youth and beauty.$b$bChalle was jealous of my love for Dahaka and I have long suspected that Challe had a part in her death. However, without evidence I could not bring justice against her.$b$bMeet with Challe and tell her that I am dying. Tell her that I wish to know the truth of Dahaka's fate before I leave this world.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Challe to discover the truth.
QuestData.CompletionText: I have not much time left. Please, discover the truth of Dahaka's death before it is too late.
QuestData.RewardText: Challe, that iniquitous wretch!$b$bIf only I had proof of her treachery long ago, I would have ripped the villainous heart from her chest and crushed it beneath my foot!$b$bYou have brought me the truth as I asked, for that you have my thanks.
